children.name: dti
children.description: diffusion tensor imaging

children.name: eddy_correct
children.description: eddy current correction

children.name: dtifit
children.description: fits a diffusion tensor model at each voxel

children.name: bedpostx
children.description: generate voxelwise distributions of diffusion parameters

children.name: make_dyadic_vectors
children.description: extract the mean fibre orientation from bedpost samples

children.name: probtrackx2
children.description: probabilistic tracking with crossing fibres

children.name: proj_thresh
children.description: expresses connection probability in connectivity-based segmentation

children.name: probtrackx
children.description: probabilistic tracking with crossing fibres

children.name: proj_thresh
children.description: expresses connection probability in connectivity-based segmentation

children.name: tbss
children.description: generate voxelwise distributions of diffusion parameters

children.name: distancemap
children.description: calculate distance to nearest non-zero voxel

children.name: eddy
children.description: correct for eddy current-induced distortions and subject movements

children.name: susan
children.description: nonlinear filtering to reduce noise in an image while preserving the underlying structure

children.name: fsl_regfilt
children.description: regress out a signal (such as ICA noise component) from data

children.name: correction
children.description: estimation and artifact correction

children.name: fugue
children.description: EPI distortion correction

children.name: prelude
children.description: performs 3D phase unwrapping of images

children.name: sigloss
children.description: estimate signal loss from a field map

children.name: topup
children.description: estimating and correcting susceptibility induced distortions

children.name: convertwarp
children.description: general tool for combining multiple transforms into one

children.name: fnirt
children.description: non-linear registration

children.name: applywarp
children.description: apply the warps estimated by fnirt to some image

children.name: fnirtfileutils
children.description: convert field->coefficients, coefficients->field, coefficients->other_coefficients

children.name: invwarp
children.description: |reverse| a non-linear mapping

children.name: flirt
children.description: automated linear (affine) intra- and inter-modal brain image registration

children.name: convert_xfm
children.description: convert between different transformation file formats

children.name: epi_reg
children.description: register EPI images to structural images

children.name: img2imgcoord
children.description: calculates the corresponding coordinate positions within a destination volume given the original coordinates in the source volume and the transformation from the source to the destination volume

children.name: img2stdcoord
children.description: equivalent to img2imgcoord except destination volume coordinates are treated as standard space coordinates

children.name: mcflirt
children.description: intra-modal motion correction tool

children.name: avscale
children.description: displays the decomposed elements of an affine matrix

children.name: fslreorient2std
children.description: reorient an image to match the orientation of the standard template images

children.name: vecreg
children.description: registration vector images

children.name: fast
children.description: automated segmentation tool

children.name: first
children.description: model-based segmentation/registration tool

children.name: run_first_all
children.description: run lower-level flirt utilities

children.name: bet
children.description: brain extraction tool

children.name: bet2
children.description: brain extraction tool

children.name: find_the_biggest
children.description: performs hard segmentation of a seed region on the basis of outputs of probtrackx

children.name: robustfov
children.description: automatically crop the image

children.name: smoothest
children.description: estimate smoothness from residual fMRI data

children.name: flameo
children.description: performs higher level model fits

children.name: fslmaths
children.description: mathematical manipulation of images

children.name: fslstats
children.description: report image summary statistics

children.name: flim_gls
children.description: fit a design matrix to voxel timeseries

children.name: cluster
children.description: cluster-based inference

children.name: randomise
children.description: nonparametric permutation inference on neuroimaging data

children.name: fsl_glm
children.description: computes regression parameters

children.name: utils
children.description: utility tools

children.name: fslcpgeom
children.description: copy header information from one image to another

children.name: fslmerge
children.description: concatenate image files into a single output

children.name: fslroi
children.description: extract region of interest from an image

children.name: fslswapdim
children.description: re-orders the data storage to permit changes between axial, sagittal and coronal slicing

children.name: fslcomplex
children.description: allows 3D or 4D complex image files to be split or constructed from corresponding real components

children.name: overlay
children.description: combine a background image with one or two statistics images

children.name: slicer
children.description: slice 3D images into 2D pictures with slices

children.name: fsl_tsplot
children.description: plot a timeseries

children.name: feat
children.description: model-based FMRI data analysis

children.name: contrast_mgr
children.description: evaluate contrasts

children.name: fslmeants
children.description: output the timeseries of voxels

children.name: melodic
children.description: independent component analysis

children.name: slicetimer
children.description: corrects for sampling offsets inherent in slice-wise EPI acquisition sequences

children.name: fslpspec
children.description: calculates the power spectral density for each time series
